description: Recently got hooked into the todotxt file. CLI stuff works great but was looking for a simple GUI version. This is the PERFECT fit. Also tried the extension but I noticed I would stop paying attention at it. Thanks to the maintainers!
summary: This is what i've been looking for!

description:
My first impression is that this app looks a lot like Agenda. But it has other functionalities that makes it the app I was searching for it. 
I believe that the team can make it a lot better.
summary: I was looking for this app!

description: The to-do lists and timers are great, but some audio cues on the timers would be extremely helpful.
The UI and icons look old and it asks me to choose where to save the todos
Can change notification type and set lengths as desired! THIS IS THE APP YOU'RE LOOKING FOR
Pomodoro, task manager, can export lists. Absolutely brilliant. Should come standard with any linux distro as the default task manager.
summary: Simple, yet full of useful features
